title: Comune di Milano
content:
Does anyone know if the face Area by Antonio Pace is available to buy?

Seen here:  
 [http://www.comune.milano.it/identitavisiva/MILANO/welcome.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20060526005724/http:/www.comune.milano.it/identitavisiva/MILANO/welcome.htm)
author: ultan

comments.content:
It is not commercially available.

It is however based on [Linotype Gianotten](http://web.archive.org/web/20060526005724/http:/www.linotype.com/1046/linotypegianotten-family.html), also designed by Antonio Pace. Maybe that would work instead?

Thanks Dan.

Ye Iâ€™m aware of LT Gianotten but was hoping to get my hands on Area, beautiful font.
